data(text, value, width=100, '%', height=None, 'px', format='txt', profile=None)¶

Python interface to the Hyperlink to retrieve data

data_link = rptObj.ui.links.data(“link”, “test#data”) data_link.build({“text”: ‘new link Name’, ‘data’: “new content”})

Parameters

  • text – The string value to be displayed in the component

  • value –

  • width – Optional. A tuple with the integer for the component width and its unit

  • height – Optional. A tuple with the integer for the component height and its unit

  • format – Optional. The downloaded data format

  • profile – Optional. A flag to set the component performance storage

external(text, url, icon=None, helper=None, height=None, 'px', decoration=False, options=None, profile=None)¶

rptObj.ui.links.external(‘data’, ‘www.google.fr’, icon=”fas fa-align-center”, options={“target”: “_blank”})

https://www.w3schools.com/TagS/att_a_href.asp

Parameters

  • text – The string value to be displayed in the component

  • url – The string url of the link

  • icon – Optional. A string with the value of the icon to display from font-awesome

  • helper –

  • height – Optional. A tuple with the integer for the component height and its unit

  • decoration –

  • options – Optional. Specific Python options available for this component

  • profile – Optional. A flag to set the component performance storage

link(text='', url='', icon=None, helper=None, height=None, 'px', decoration=False, options=None, profile=None)¶

Python interface to the common Hyperlink

rptObj.ui.link({“text”: “Profiling results”, “url”: ‘#’})

l = rptObj.ui.links.link(‘data’, ‘www.google.fr’, icon=”fas fa-align-center”, options={“target”: “_blank”}) b = rptObj.ui.images.badge(“new”) l.append_child(b)

Parameters

  • text – The string value to be displayed in the component

  • url – The string url of the link

  • icon – Optional. A string with the value of the icon to display from font-awesome

  • helper –

  • height – Optional. A tuple with the integer for the component height and its unit

  • decoration –

  • options – Optional. Specific Python options available for this component

  • profile – Optional. A flag to set the component performance storage

script(script_name, report_name=None, icon='fab fa-python', options=None, profile=None)¶

Direct link to another report within the server.

This is only dedicated to move between reports internally. If the target is to move between nodes, the function to use is rather bridge

rptObj.ui.links.script(“TestParams”)

Parameters

  • script_name – The destination script name

  • report_name – Optional, the report name. Default current one

  • options – Optional, the link properties

Return type

html.HtmlLinks.ExternalLink

Returns
